abilities.name: MUNITIONS RESERVES
abilities.description: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods; you may re-roll any number of your dice during that combat round.

abilities.name: ARMADA
abilities.description: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

flagship.name: Arc Secundus
abilities: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD
At the start of each space combat round, repair this ship

base.name: War Funding
base.effect: At the start of a round of space combat: The Letnev player loses 2 trade goods. During this combat round, reroll any number of your dice.
base.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

omega.name: War Funding
omega.effect: After you and your opponent roll dice during space combat: You may reroll all of your opponent's dice. You may reroll any number of your dice.
omega.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

base.name: Viscount Unlenn
base.ability: At the start of a space combat round, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system. That ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

base.name: Rear Admiral Farran
base.ability: After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may gain 1 Trade Good.

base.name: Darktalon Treilla
base.ability: ACTION: Place this card near the game board; the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by laws or by the number of command tokens in your fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.
